column1: ...She ask if you are bird friend.
How did you end up here?
Mother... Father... swallowed by the sea...
I... I washed up on shore...
...No, no, no... Th... That was just a dream... right?
...No... I was born here, just like all the other bird friends. Can't you tell?
column2: ……不對……我就是在這裡出生的，就像其他所有的朋友鳥鳥一樣。你看不出來嗎？

column1: If you're a bird, how can you speak?
column2: 你是鳥的話，你是怎麼說話的？

column1: Haha! See? We speak! We speak!
column2: 哈哈！看到了嗎？我們能說話！我們能說話！

column1: We say... 'How many golden walnuts have you eaten?'
column2: 我們會問……「你吃過多少金核桃？」

column1: ...But you don't become an elder until you've eaten 10,000.
column2: ……你得吃過 10000 個才能變成長老。
